mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookmarket ( book_id, name, author, unit_price, description, unit_in_stock, publisher, total_pages, release_date, condition, filename, category ) VALUES ( #{bookId}, #{name}, #{author}, #{unitPrice}, #{description}, #{unitInStock}, #{publisher}, #{totalPages}, #{releaseDate}, #{condition}, #{filename}, #{category} )
mapper.select: select book_id, name, author, unit_price, description, unit_in_stock, publisher, total_pages, release_date, condition, filename, category from bookmarket
select book_id, name, author, unit_price, description, unit_in_stock, publisher, total_pages, release_date, condition, filename, category from bookmarket where book_id = #{bookId}
